long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extensions adds a context menu to chrome that allows encoding and decoding base64 strings directly into your clipboard. Additionally, it allows to navigate to urls encoded in base64 by simply selecting them on the page.

No more switching between tabs, just highlight the text, right click, and either navigate directly if it is an encoded url, copy the encoded/decoded string into your clipboard.
